plot: Squawk 1200 documents the world of aviation. Host and air enthusiast, Andrew Schmertz, travels around the United States with director and cameraman Guy Helson, interviewing pilots and capturing the joy of flight.
title: Squawk 1200: Tales from the Air
plot_es: Squawk 1200 documents the world of aviation. Host and air enthusiast, Andrew Schmertz, travels around the United States with director and cameraman Guy Helson, interviewing pilots and capturing the joy of flight.
plot_en: Squawk 1200 documents the world of aviation. Host and air enthusiast, Andrew Schmertz, travels around the United States with director and cameraman Guy Helson, interviewing pilots and capturing the joy of flight.
